My favourite first person shooter. Even though it is quite old (can probably run this on a toaster at this point), it is still great fun, and at least in my opinion, better than Valorant. Unfortunately there are cheaters, probably mostly due to the fact it is free to play, but you can avoid most of them by paying for prime.

Used to play this game with my friends back then, i regret every single second spent on this shit full of hackers and the whole russian army that are now invading their closest neighbour. 
Please dont do the same mistake and stay away from this garbage, make yourself a favor.
